definitions.text: be compatible or in accordance with
examples: You must adhere to the rules

definitions.text: follow through or carry out a plan without deviation
come or be in close contact with; stick or hold together and resist separation
examples: The dress clings to her body
The label stuck to the box

definitions.text: be a devoted follower or supporter
examples: The residents of this village adhered to Catholicism
She stood by her husband in times of trouble
The friends stuck together through the war
Will this wallpaper adhere to the wall?
